data.message: Am I the only one worried that he did another song with Skylar Grey and Kobe on a SHADY album?

replies.message: Still, Em verses are gonna be full on SHADY. Don't worry!
I really hope so I think back on "Asshole" with Skylar Grey and his verses had that old Em feel, but we'll see haha
That's what I'm saying, it made me not look forward to listening to the song cause I knew I had to listen to those hooks
He went soft when he was with Rihanna :/
Skylar Grey was great in I Need A Doctor. I'm glad he is doing another song with her.
In that song he was just screaming the whole time. Idk I just don't like him working with these singers on the hooks
He needs to sing in the hooks like in the the eminem show
YESSSS if he starts doing that again it would be great. Not too much like Recovery but just take it to wayyy back
Man Eminem has nothing to prove to you david, if don't like his new stuff get his old albums. I swear they r still selling

Disc X: Die Alone, Guts Over Fear (even though it's been released as a single), Right For Me, Shady XV, Psychopath, Vegas, Detroit Vs. Everybody, Fine Line, Bane. These will be the best. 

On disc V: I Get Money, Purple Pills, Lose Yourself, Cry Now (Shady Remix), P. I. M. P., You Don't Know, My Band, The Setup (Ft. Nate Dogg, In Da Club, Fight Music. Will be the best.

Ezenwa you sound stupid. I'm not hating on Eminem, he is one of my favorite rappers, I'm just saying I would prefer for him to not have singers on the hook. Think about it before you say something stupid lmao
